minecraft:feats/angry_ghast.description: Defeat the Angry Ghast special event

minecraft:feats/wither_skeleton_skull.description: Acquire a Wither Skeleton Skull to unlock the Wither special event

minecraft:mines/all_mine_ingredients.description: Complete at least one Mine with each possible Mine Ingredient

minecraft:mines/complete_water_cave_leve.description: Complete a Mine with Water World and Cave World active

minecraft:mines/mine_crafter_upgraded.description: Upgrade the Mine Crafter so you can keep mining and crafting

minecraft:story/obtain_armor.description: Protect yourself with a piece of iron armor
